org.ipdr.api.configuration
Interface CollectorConfigI

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectorConfigBase
public interface CollectorConfigI

This interface provides configuration of the collector.

Method Detail

getCollectorAddress

public java.net.Inet4Address getCollectorAddress()
Returns IP address of the collector.

getCollectorStartInterval

public int getCollectorStartInterval()
Interval to wait between starting threads, to avoid a burst of activity at the beginning.

getCollectorSupportDiscovery

public boolean getCollectorSupportDiscovery()
Indicates whether the collector should support UDP-based discovery

Returns:
true if discovery is supported

getCollectorProtocolVersion

public int getCollectorProtocolVersion()
Returns collector's supported protocol version

Returns:
1 for CRANE, 2 for IPDR

getReceiveBufferSize

public int getReceiveBufferSize()
Returns default receive buffer size

Returns:
Buffer size

getAcceptTimeout

public int getAcceptTimeout()
Returns accept timeout. The accept timeout is used by ListeningSocketHandler to check for shutdown requests periodically rather than hang on the server socket indefinitely.

Returns:
value of the accept timeout

isStrictTemplates

public boolean isStrictTemplates()
Returns strict templates configuration value. If this is true, each template received from exporter is validated against the existing configuration.

Returns:
true if strict templates are on

getCapabilitiesStructures

public boolean getCapabilitiesStructures()
Indicates whether structured templates are supported

Returns:
false always

getCapabilitiesMultiSession

public boolean getCapabilitiesMultiSession()
Indicates whether multiple sessions over same connection are supported

Returns:
true if multiple sessions are supported

getCapabilitesTemplateNegotiation

public boolean getCapabilitesTemplateNegotiation()
Indicates whether the collector should support template negotiation

Returns:
true if template negotiaton is supported

getVendorId

public java.lang.String getVendorId()
Returns vendor id

Returns:
vendor id

getExporterAt

public ExporterConfigI getExporterAt(int position)
Allows random access to the list of exporter configurations. Returns exporter configuration by index value

Parameters:
position - index value of the exporter
Returns:
ExporterConfigI of the appropriate exporter

getExporterListLength

public int getExporterListLength()
Returns number of existing exporter configurations

Returns:
length of internal exporter list

findExporter

public ExporterConfigI findExporter(java.net.InetAddress address)
Returns exporter configuration by address

Parameters:
address - InetAddress which is looked up in the list of exporters
Returns:
Exporter configuration for the given address

getLocalPort

public int getLocalPort()
Returns local port to listen for incoming connections on

Returns:
local TCP port for inbound connections

findTemplate

public TemplateConfig findTemplate(int id)
Locates template configuration by given template id

Parameters:
id - id to find template by it
Returns:
TemplateConfig with the given id

getTemplateAt

public TemplateConfig getTemplateAt(int position)
Locates template by its ordinal number rather than by id

Parameters:
position - index value of template
Returns:
TemplateConfig at the given position

getTemplateListLength

public int getTemplateListLength()
Returns number of configured templates

Returns:
length of template list

getBacklogSize

public int getBacklogSize()
Returns backlog size for incoming connections.

Returns:
backlog size

getUDPDiscoveryPort

public int getUDPDiscoveryPort()
Returns UDP port to listen for incoming discovery requests on.

Returns:
UDP discovery port

getUDPDiscoveryTimeout

public int getUDPDiscoveryTimeout()
Returns UDP discovery timeout value. After discovery timeout, the collector concludes the exporter does not support UDP-based discovery

Returns:
UDP discovery timeout value in seconds

isTemplateDefined

public boolean isTemplateDefined(TemplateConfig template)
Returns true if the template passed as the parameter is configured.

Parameters:
template - to check if it was configured
Returns:
true if such template is configured

getSupportCRANE

public boolean getSupportCRANE()
Returns true if legacy CRANE protocol should be supported by the collector

Returns:
true if CRANE must be supported

public long getControllerQueryInterval()
Returns:
